name: Defend All Humans! (99Kap)
description:
DAH is a fast paced shooter where you must survive as long as possible! Defend humans from enemy robots. Upgrade yourself for maximum efficiency! Buy weapons, new floors, and more! Also includes full controller support!

Control layouts (Keyboard/XBOX)

Jump: Space bar/ A Button

Fire: RMB/ Right Trigger

Reload: R key/ X Button

Interact: F key/ Y Button

Enjoy :)

Team: Runnon Games

99Kap @99Kap2

Ruse35
